result.title: Rules...!
result.content:
In the name of Allah the most compassionate the most merciful.

Hi every one!

As I pointed, the main goal is to improve our skills. Removing people of group didn't relate to their ratings. Logically, the more active you are, the more chance you have to stay. Actually, we may need to have problem writers not only good problem setters or good problem solvers.

  1. Each problem should have a title in this form: N.name Level others N is the problem number and Level can be simple, medium, hard or very hard. Please note that we won't need simple problems otherwise they are beautiful enough to be noticed.
  2. The statement of the problem must be as simple as possible and the solution should be below the statement as an spoiler.
  3. I myself think about different ideas about the problems(even I don't know whether the idea result a good problem or not) and I encourage you to do, too.
  4. Comments can have anythings about the problem, improve that or about the better solutions. Spammers will be kicked.
  5. If anyone won't be active whole a week, he/she will be kicked unless in special conditions.

Because the group is young yet, there is no new problem. But you can see my problems in codeforces a few week later or my problems in other sites that I may post it here.

I'll appreciate if there is any suggestion.

Goodbye.
